title: Don't get duped by these vaccine scams
description:
From the Recode Daily archives (Feb. 8, 2021): The latest innovation in pandemic scamming is fake vaccine doses and vaccine cards. Recode’s Rebecca Heilweil explains the tactics and how to avoid getting scammed.
Read Rebecca's story here. 


Host: Teddy Schleifer (@teddyschleifer)


Enjoyed this episode? Rate us ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐and leave a review on Apple Podcasts.



Subscribe for free. Be the first to hear the next episode by subscribing in your favorite podcast app.
